addon.name: Tag Overview
addon.provider-name: fnord12 via olivaar (with teriyaki Matrix update)

extension.summary: A quick way to edit tags and see an overview of all tags.
extension.description: Reviving and updating the Tag Overview created by olivaar. You can put this in your keymap to run the script by pressing the t key: <t>RunScript(script.tagoverview)</t>
extension.news: Updated for Nexus. Added mouse support. Added support for stacked movies. Updated sorting. Added context menu. Added delete confirmation.
